modName: True Unique Playable Dremora Race Mod
summary: This Mod allows you to play as a Dremora lots of customization and custom shout sounds!! and custom female voiced Dremora  and you know how to craft in Daedric mehrune dagon style weapons.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][color=#ff7700]This mod is outdated[/color] [color=#ff7700][size=5] and a new version is available.[/size][/color][size=5] [color=#ff0000]Please note that the new Dremora mod does not have most of the things from this mod. [/color] [/size][/size][color=#00ff00][size=4]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81745/?[/size]  
[/color]

I am no longer working on this mod. I am remaking this mod And its a lot better if you want to check out what i have Done Facebook Link Below done https://www.facebook.com/SkyrimModsForPc/?ref=bookmarks


This Mod allows you to play as a Dremora lots of customization and custom shout sounds!! and custom female voiced Dremora  and you know how to craft in Daedric Mehrune Dagon style weapons.[/i][/u]

[b][color=#fce5cd]The Shouts For the male Dremora are custom and i hop you like it.

To craft the weapons they are in the Daedric section of the forge.

There are lots of customization to your Daedric race EYES! FACE PAINTS! and HAIR! and default customization!!

You can also become a vampire!!

[/color][/b]The idea of this mod came from Elder Scrolls Online

[u][[color=#ff0000]BAD THINGS IN MOD[/color]][/u]
[color=#ff0000]When you become a vampire lord it reverts you back to your default dremora so if this happens to you type this in the console
                                                             >      [/color] [u]SetRace DeadraStepDremoraRaceVampire[/u]  [color=#ff0000]       <

[/color]                                                                                      [i][u][color=#00ff00][b]YouTube[/b][/color] [b][color=#00ff00]Videos

[/color][/b][/u][/i]                            [youtube]pJSKtzxq11A[/youtube]

author: DeadraStep
